title: About me
paragraphs: My name is MÃ¡rio Travassos, a highly-motivated, passionate Software Developer from Portugal. I'm deeply interested in **Web Design and Development**, **Computer Graphics** and **Game Development**.

With a solid foundation in Front-end and Full-stack web technologies, I seek to create **innovative applications that deliver engaging user experiences**. As my passions extend to computer graphics and game development, I continously explore new techniques in those fields to craft **immersive and thrilling digital adventures**.

I have just completed my academic journey at ||FEUP[fe.up.pt]||, where I developed my dissertation work focused on studying cutting-edge **3D reconstruction techniques**, with the ultimate goal of **streamlining the creation of photo-realistic WebVR experiences**.

Away from the digital world, you can find me engaging in multiple activities, from **repairing and tinkering** to **reading**, **cooking** or **playing video or trading card games**. I am also an avid **language learning enthusiast**, and I am currently hard at work studying japanese.
paragraphs2: I am currently working as a **freelance full-stack developer**. Currently looking for other ventures, but still open to new opportunities.
As part of my language-learning journey, I keep on **sentence-mining** and **immersing in japanese media**, with the goal of further improving my japanese language proficiency.
All the while, I continue **researching computer graphics** as a hobby.
